ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
You heard 'em
It's my fault
this town wasdestroyed

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Barret}
You heard 'em
It's my fault
this town wasdestroyed

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Barret}
Can't keep regrettin' the past
It's the future
we gotta think about now.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // {Tifa}
I wonder what Shinra wants to do
with all that Huge Materia?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Red XIII}
What are we going to do now?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // {Red XIII}
We HAVE to stop them!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:55}); // {Red XIII}
We HAVE to stop them!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:43}); // {Cid}
Sorry
I never shoulda gave that Huge Materia
to the Shinra so easily

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Cid}
There's only one more Huge Materia
the Shinra needs
That's the one at the Underwater Reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // {Cid}
With us always in their face,
even the Shinra's gotta be
getting tired of it all.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // {Cid}
We have to hurry that much
Right now I'm more worried
about him than anything else!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:51}); // {Cid}
Yeah, and I'm worried
about {Tifa}, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:52}); // {Cid}
Let's go see
what's going on at {CYAN}Mideel{WHITE}

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:48}); // {Cid}
There's only one more Huge Materia
the Shinra needs
That's the one at the Underwater Reactor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:49}); // {Cid}
With us always in their face,
even the Shinra's gotta be
getting tired of it all.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:50}); // {Cid}
We have to hurry that much
Right now I'm more worried
about him than anything else!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:51}); // {Cid}
Yeah, and I'm worried
about {Tifa}, too.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:52}); // {Cid}
Let's go see
what's going on at {CYAN}Mideel{WHITE}

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:44}); // {Yuffie}
No use baggin' on yourself!
It's not like you, OLD guy!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // {Yuffie}
We've got to hurry and stop 'em!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:57}); // {Yuffie}
We've got to hurry and stop 'em!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:45}); // {Cait Sith}
It's not all over yet.
Cheer up!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // {Cait Sith}
We headin' out to
the Underwater Reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:59}); // {Cait Sith}
We headin' out to
the Underwater Reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:46}); // {Vincent}
Isn't is too early
to give up?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // {Vincent}
Are we going to
the Underwater Reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:61}); // {Vincent}
Are we going to
the Underwater Reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // I figure if I stay alive long enough,
something good's bound to happen.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // Look down nuthin' but junk.
Look upMeteor.{PAUSE}Am I gonna be stuck between these two
for the rest of my life?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // Some Shinra soldiers went up to Mt. Corel.
They said they're collecting Huge Materia
to blow up Meteor!{PAUSE}Ya think they can really do it?
I'll bet the reactor destroys everything
even before Meteor hits!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // Look down nuthin' but junk.
Look upMeteor.{PAUSE}Am I gonna be stuck between these two
for the rest of my life?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // I'll never understand the rich.
I heard some guy named
Dio at the Gold Saucer
is collectin' rocks!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // YOU know who's responsible for North Corel
winding up like this!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // Well, lookey here!
Never thought
I'd ever see your face again.
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // I wanna play at the Gold Saucer

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // And it's only a Ropeway ride away
but I don't have enough money to play

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // Those people over there,
they with you?{PAUSE}Well, I feel sorry for 'em!
Hangin' around a walkin' death sentence
like {Barret}.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // They kick you out of
another town or somethin'?{PAUSE}You destroy everything you touch.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // Why doncha say something!?{PAUSE}Or did ya forget
what you done here already?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // Take that road on the left
to the Ropeway station!{PAUSE}The Ropeway'll take you
to the Gold Saucer.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // It don't mean much
to us poor folks though

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // Whenever I look up in the sky,
I see Meteor staring me right in the face{PAUSE}If you're gonna crash down, then hurry up!!
'Cause I'm gonna kick the $#@& outta ya!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:25}); // Shinra soldiers came around sayin'
they were gathering up
all the Huge Materia.{PAUSE}I think they're gonna bring it here
by coal train, from the {CYAN}Corel Reactor{WHITE}.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // Staring up at Meteor
won't put food in my stomach.{PAUSE}But if I look down,
sometimes I find somethin' to eat.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // A buncha guys called Turks came here
sayin' they'd pay 10000 gil for
some rock called a 'Keystone'.{PAUSE}When I asked how much they'd pay for
a regular rock just layin' around here,
they slapped me upside my damn head!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // Get out of the way!!{PAUSE}The only way we can make ends meet around
here now is by collecting junk!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // You got a lot of nerve
comin' back here!{PAUSE}Look at this place!
It's all your fault North Corel
turned into a garbage heap!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // ^%$#!
You ain't even worth the effort.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // Don't waste your time talkin' to
that Techno-freak!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // Hey,
the Gold Saucer reopened!{PAUSE}We've got to play hard
to get our minds off Meteor.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // Hey,
what's gonna happen to the world?{PAUSE}I guess no one wants to have fun anymore
now that the Gold Saucer is closing

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // Really?
I saw a big '1' on the arm of
a young guy heading towards the Ropeway.
That Black Cape he had on was really cool.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // I guess I should get a '0' tattoo!
For a poor man like me,
'0' oughtta be perfect.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:32}); // If you want to survive,
then you're gonna need
some of my weapons.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // Please buy something!
Anything will do!

{Barret}
You heard 'em
It's my fault
this town wasdestroyed

{Barret}
Wait here

Can't keep regrettin' the past
It's the future
we gotta think about now.

{Barret}
I'm sorry

YOU know who's responsible for North Corel
winding up like this!

Well, lookey here!
Never thought
I'd ever see your face again.

I'll never understand the rich.

Dio at the Gold Saucer
is collectin' rocks!

I figure if I stay alive long enough,
something good's bound to happen.

Some Shinra soldiers went up to Mt. Corel.

here now is by collecting junk!
You, you're

Hey!!
He's back!

You got a lot of nerve

It's all your fault North Corel

^%$#!
You ain't even worth the effort.

Don't waste your time talkin' to
that Techno-freak!

Whenever I look up in the sky,

A buncha guys called Turks came here

a regular rock just layin' around here,

Shinra soldiers came around sayin'
they were gathering up
all the Huge Materia.{PAUSE}I think they're gonna bring it here
by coal train, from the {CYAN}Corel Reactor{WHITE}.

Staring up at Meteor
won't put food in my stomach.{PAUSE}But if I look down,
sometimes I find somethin' to eat.

I hear it's a big fad now in the city
to get tattoos. Is that right?
{CHOICE}I wouldn't know
{CHOICE}That's right

Really?
I saw a big '1' on the arm of
a young guy heading towards the Ropeway.
That Black Cape he had on was really cool.

I guess I should get a '0' tattoo!
For a poor man like me,
'0' oughtta be perfect.

Hey,
what's gonna happen to the world?{PAUSE}I guess no one wants to have fun anymore
now that the Gold Saucer is closing

Hey,
the Gold Saucer reopened!{PAUSE}We've got to play hard
to get our minds off Meteor.

If you want to survive,
then you're gonna need
some of my weapons.

Please buy something!
Anything will do!

What do you want?
{CHOICE}Buy
{CHOICE}Listen to your story
{CHOICE}Not interested

Take that road on the left
to the Ropeway station!{PAUSE}The Ropeway'll take you
to the Gold Saucer.

It don't mean much
to us poor folks though

Sometimes, I see something glowin'
inside the well.
If I ever get it, I'm going to sell it
and go to the Gold Saucer.

I'm gonna keep diggin' in this well
till I come out
on the other side of the world{PAUSE}Then, I'm going to make lotsa friends.

I got this out of that well.
This rock must REALLY be something!!

Whoops
You can't hold all those.{PAUSE}Here, I'll keep it in my pocket,
and you can come by later and
get it, OK?
